username.title: Instagram username
username.description: Just insert a username or URL of the profile you want to get the reels from.

datasetName.title: Dataset name
datasetName.description: Name of the dataset where the reels will be saved.

resultsLimit.title: Maximum reels per profile
resultsLimit.description: Maximum number of reels you want to scrape per profile. If you set it to 5, you'll get 5 reels for each profile you've included.

delay.title: Delay between requests post to Instagram
delay.description: Avoid getting banned by Instagram by setting a delay between requests. The delay is in milliseconds.

maxPosts.title: Maximum posts to post to Instagram
maxPosts.description: Maximum number of posts you want to post to Instagram. If you set it to 5, you'll post 5 reels to Instagram.

accessToken.title: Facebook long-lived access token
accessToken.description: You can get a Facebook access token from https://developers.facebook.com/tools/explorer/.

instagramPageID.title: Instagram page ID. Used for posting reels to Instagram.
instagramPageID.description: You can get an Instagram page ID from https://developers.facebook.com/tools/explorer/.

hashtags.title: Hashtags
hashtags.description: Hashtags to add to the reels you post to Instagram. Don't forget to add # at the beginning of each tag.
